Class FieldData<FORMTABLE extends AbstractAdminData<?>>

java.lang.Object
  org.mxupdate.test.data.AbstractData<DATA>
      org.mxupdate.test.data.AbstractAdminData<FieldData<FORMTABLE>>
          org.mxupdate.test.data.userinterface.FieldData<FORMTABLE>
Type Parameters:
FORMTABLE - class of the related table / form
public class FieldData<FORMTABLE extends AbstractAdminData<?>>
extends AbstractAdminData<FieldData<FORMTABLE>>

Defines on column / field of a table.

Version:
$Id: FieldData.java 586 2009-10-18 15:52:59Z tim.moxter $
Author:
The MxUpdate Team

Field Summary
private  Boolean autoHeight
          Must be true if the column / field has auto height.
private  Boolean autoWidth
          Must be true if the column / field has auto width.
private  Boolean editable
          Must be true if the column / field id editable.
private  Double height
          Height of this column / field.
private  Double minHeight
          Minimum height of this column / field.
private  Double minWidth
          Minimum width of this column / field.
private  Double scale
          The scale of a column is a natural number, but for test purposes the scale is here a double.
private  Map<String,String> settings
          All settings related to this field.
private  String sortType
          Sort type of this column / field.
private  FORMTABLE tableForm
          Related table / form which defines this field.
private  Set<AbstractUserData<?>> users
          All users related to this field.
private  Double width
          Width of this column / field.
